description.lang: Our Connect+ Panels bring complete security and home automation into one platform. A modern design that is easy to install and blends into any environment. Professional security that is UL compliant, with blazing fast communications and control. Modular and customizable with snap-in modules for cellular backup, smart device control, and existing sensor take over.Your customers will love how easy it is to control their security with smart devices and easy setup of scenes and automation.RE6100P-XX-X CONNECT+ PANELEthernet PortBackup BatteryUL CompliantSnap-in ModulesBluetooth Smart Radio TransceiverSlot 1 & 2 Available Expansion CardsLTE: RE929RPVWI-FI: RE926RSSlot 3 Pick 1 optionZ-WAVE: RE934ZCOMBINATION: RE934ZT

deviceDescription.productName: Helix Security Panel with Z-Wave Controller (Europe)

description.lang: Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, only Device Reset Locally Notification supported.
